Html:
Hi,
I don't know why its doesn't matter what the LatLng of the marker2 but the map show only the last marker. (Yellow), tried on BING and GOOGLE, same result.

The Tooltip show both markers together and again, its doest matter if location of marker2 even 0, 0...


Whats wrong in the code?


markersOverlay.Clear();

GMarkerGoogle marker = new GMarkerGoogle(new PointLatLng(48, 16.4), GMarkerGoogleType.green);
marker.ToolTip = new GMapRoundedToolTip(marker);
marker.ToolTipText = "345 Park Ave";
marker.Tag = 1;
marker.ToolTipMode = MarkerTooltipMode.OnMouseOver;

markersOverlay.Markers.Add(marker);
GMarkerGoogle marker2 = new GMarkerGoogle(new PointLatLng(45, 16.4), GMarkerGoogleType.yellow);
marker2.ToolTip = new GMapRoundedToolTip(marker2);
marker2.ToolTipText = "Point 2";
marker2.ToolTipMode = MarkerTooltipMode.OnMouseOver;
marker2.Tag = 2;

markersOverlay.Markers.Add(marker2);

gMapControl.Overlays.Add(markersOverlay);
Try to add the overlay to the map first, then add markers to the overlay.
